messages.subject: School creates failures
messages.msgSnippet: ... School creates failures. It certifies people to be failures. It fails people. For every success school claims it creates, it creates MANY failures. For
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/10/05 10:24:23 AM, aplan4life@... writes:


> -=-The harsh reality is that most welfare recipients and people in this
> country who are below poverty and/or poor were public schooled, not
> unschooled or homeschooled.Â -=-
>
School creates failures.
It certifies people to be failures.
It fails people.

For every success school claims it creates, it creates MANY failures.
For every valedictorian, how many dropouts?
For every A, how many F's?

Failure comes from school.

Sandra




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
